about_1: The history of Trollhättan Kannadigara sangha is very short, we were just a few families who were getting together for the occational ugadi, holi and deepavali festivals.
about_2: This transitioned into upwards of 20 families with organized events for Ugadi and Deepawali.
about_3: And in March 2023, we finally registered with Skattaverket to have our official kannada sangha
